greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse permutation to A277880.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (Scheme) (define (A277881 n) (let ((row (A277813 n)) (col (A277822 n))) (* (/ 1 2) (- (expt (+ row col) 2) row col col col -2))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 03 2016
